item.title: creole beef gumbo
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup celery with its leaves, cut 2 tablespoons butter 2 1/2 cups chopped tomato 8 cups of water 1 1/4 cup rice 1 1/2 cups onion, chopped fine 1 tablespoon sugar 4 teaspoons salt 1/2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce Directions Saut√© the celery in butter for 3 minutes. Add the tomato and water. Bring to a boil, add the onion, sugar, salt and Worcestershire sauce. Bring to a boil for 30 minutes.
